name: Taxi Driver 3D-Extreme Taxi driving & parking game
name_original: Taxi Driver 3D-Extreme Taxi driving & parking game
description:
Taxi Driver 3D simulator is a new and latest cool game in Simulation category. You might have driven the taxi but never were on a taxi driving seat!!! If you love the crazy taxi driving hurry up just get into the game and enjoy wild driving on the busy roads of modern city.
You can enhance your driving skills by driving luxury and latest taxis. It’s your own taxi, your own rules. You’re Speediness, drift and switch around corners and weave through traffic. So it’s your turn to become a real taxi driver in big modern city! Drive as fast as you can. Do all what you want in this taxi simulation game. The only aim is to deliver passengers to their destination points.
Taxi Driver 3D is packed with thrilling and exciting pick and drop missions in modern and advanced city in night mood, street lights are glowing making the city more beautiful and attractive. Your duty is to pick up the passengers from distant places and take them to their destinations in minimum time. You have to park the taxi very precisely in given parking area to avoid any accident. Attractive but stunning and challenging turns will not let you to reach your destination easily and on time. Transport passengers by tapping into various controls and driving settings. You are a late night taxi driver so be careful and stay active all the time and enjoy the adventure of taxi driving along with traffic vehicles including cars and buses etc. If your taxi hit any traffic vehicle or you are being hit by any vehicle then your health will decrease. So be a mature driver and enjoy taxi drifting.
Play crazy taxi driver 3D as much as you can to earn maximum cash for buying luxurious and latest taxis and enjoy the best taxi driving ever in super modern and advanced city in night mode.
Taxi Driver 3D Features
• Tremendously fast and fun taxi cab options
• Earn money as much as you can
• Intelligent traffic system to add more challenge and adventure to this modern taxi driving 3d game
• Multiple camera views including highly attractive first person view driving
• HD Night mode 3D environment
• Detailed Animated passengers
• GPS and mini map to guide the taxi duty driver in car driving mission
• Thrilling game play
Go and get a luxurious taxi to reach your destination. Don’t be late, race around the city and complete missions on time. Use the GPS and mini map as your guide to help you reach your destination. Find the best route possible and save costly time! The customers are waiting, SO HURRY UP! Download and enjoy the TAXI DRIVER 3Dfor free from iTune store….
